title: Bloomberg Markets: Whole Foods Said to Shake Up Board
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Whole Foods Said to Shake Up Board
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Craig Giammona Consumer Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Whole Foods Market Inc. is planning to shake up its board in a bid to ward off a proxy fight with activist investor Jana Partners.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
